articles.title: 'A surgeon left a medical specimen bag inside me after hernia op' - BBC.com
articles.description: Part of Tom Hadrys's bowel cut out during the operation was also left behind by the surgeon.
articles.content:
By Joe Pike and Charlotte Rowles,BBC Newsnight
Tom Hadrys told Newsnight about the lasting impact on his health following his hernia surgery in 2016
A man discovered a medical specimen bag had been… [+4540 chars]
